about_the_game:
This DLC includes the Bless Online: Serpent Squire Pack, which offers a variety of items to help players to start their new Bless adventure,
including an automatic looting pet and Lumena, and more.

The Bless Online: Serpent Squire Pack can be downloaded once per account. As all components are character bound, please collect the DLC pack only with the character you wish to use it on.

The Bless Online: Serpent Squire Pack includes the following benefits:

  • Mirror Ball Watcher (Auto-Loot Pet)
    Players may now hunt freely without interruption with the New Mirror Ball Watcher's auto loot function.

  • Lumena (500)
    Receive 500 Lumena to spend as you wish in-game. Don’t forget to visit the Lumena Shop!

  • Inventory Expansion Ticket (8 slot expansion x 1)
    Expand your inventory with the Inventory Expansion Ticket.

  • Companion Growth Potion (1 Hour) (x 5) (*Bonus Item)
    The Companion Growth Potion Increases companion EXP gain by 20% for 1 hour.

  • Nutrition Refreshment for Pets (1 Hour) (x 10) (*Bonus Item)
    The Nutrition Refreshment for Pets reduces a summoned pet’s stamina consumption by 20% for 1 hour.

To apply purchased DLC products in-game, please follow the steps below.
  • Obtain the purchased DLC from your Steam Inventory.
  • Log in to Bless and open your account inbox.
  • The items will be automatically sent to your character’s mailbox upon receipt.
    Once you accept the items in your mailbox, the item will automatically be added to the inventory of the character you used to accept the item.

Note:
- The items will be sent individually via the Account Inbox. Please make sure to select the correct character when redeeming each item.
- Please note that once the item is redeemed to a character’s inventory, it cannot be transferred to another character.
